definition: an unpleasant or disastrous destiny, decree or designate beforehand
details:
noun
- an unpleasant or disastrous destiny
= example: an unpleasant or disastrous destiny
= synonyms: doomsday, day of reckoning, end of the world
verb
- decree or designate beforehand
= synonyms: fate, destine, designate
- make certain of the failure or destruction of
= example: make certain of the failure or destruction of
- pronounce a sentence on (somebody) in a court of law
= synonyms: sentence
